net.metro.analyze

Interface MarkerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LineEdit, SystemMap, WayPointEdit

    public interface MarkerListener
    Interface designed to inform other GUI elements of actions taken place within a SystemMap. Every active listener can use this information to determine when a map marker is being hovered over, selected, moving, or not selected at all.
    Author:
    Sean Harger

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  MarkerListener.MarkerEvent
      Event object containing information regarding changes to map WayPoints and Stops.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void markerMoved(MarkerListener.MarkerEvent e)
      Called when the user moves a map marker from one location to another.
      void markerMoving(MarkerListener.MarkerEvent e)
      Called when the user is actively moving a map marker.
      void markerNotSelected()
      Called when the user selects a space on the map not occupied by a map marker.
      void markerSelected(MarkerListener.MarkerEvent e)
      Called when the user selects a map marker by clicking it on the map.
      void mouseHoveringOverMarker(MarkerListener.MarkerEvent e)
      Called when the user's mouse is hovering over a map marker.
      void mouseHoveringOverNothing()
      Called when the user's mouse is not hovering over a map marker.

    • Method Detail

      • mouseHoveringOverMarker

        void mouseHoveringOverMarker(MarkerListener.MarkerEvent e)
        Called when the user's mouse is hovering over a map marker.
        Parameters:
        e - MarkerEvent object indicating the hovering marker.

      • mouseHoveringOverNothing

        void mouseHoveringOverNothing()
        Called when the user's mouse is not hovering over a map marker.

      • markerSelected

        void markerSelected(MarkerListener.MarkerEvent e)
        Called when the user selects a map marker by clicking it on the map.
        Parameters:
        e - MarkerEvent object indicating the selected marker.

      • markerMoved

        void markerMoved(MarkerListener.MarkerEvent e)
        Called when the user moves a map marker from one location to another.
        Parameters:
        e - MarkerEvent object indicating the marker moved and the location moved to.

      • markerMoving

        void markerMoving(MarkerListener.MarkerEvent e)
        Called when the user is actively moving a map marker.
        Parameters:
        e - MarkerEvent object indicating the marker moving and the current position of the user's mouse.

      • markerNotSelected

        void markerNotSelected()
        Called when the user selects a space on the map not occupied by a map marker.
